testSets.name: Test data spec generation on a span in a paragraph

testCases.n: Data spec key formatting from capitalisation
Data spec key formatting from capitalisation, longer
Data spec key formatting from capitalisation, very long
Data spec key preserves existing, but lower
Data spec key preserves existing, but lower, with double dashes removed
Data spec key preserves existing, but lower, with triple dashes removed
Data spec key preserves existing, but lower, with dot replaced with dash
Data spec key preserves existing, but lower, with underscore replaced with dash
Data spec key preserves existing, but lower, with apostrophe replaced with dash
Data spec key preserves existing, but lower, with pound replaced with dash
Data spec key preserves existing, but lower, with hash replaced with dash
Data spec key preserves existing, but lower, with bang replaced with dash
Data spec key preserves existing, but lower, with double quotes replaced with dash
Data spec key preserves existing, all caps
Data spec key preserves existing, all caps, with double dashes removed
Data spec key preserves existing, all caps, with triple dashes removed
Data spec key preserves existing, all caps, with dot replaced with dash
Data spec key preserves existing, all caps, with underscore replaced with dash
